content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
ALTER PROC [dbo].[ImportDimMovieActors] AS begin

;with d as (
	select distinct
		c.SourceSystemMovieID
		, a.ActorID
	from extern.[catalog] c
	inner join dbo.DimActors a on a.ActorName = c.ActorName
)
insert into dbo.DimMovieActors
(
	MovieID
	, ActorID
)
select
	d.SourceSystemMovieID
	, d.ActorID
from d
where not exists (
	select 1 from dbo.DimMovieActors ma where ma.MovieID = d.SourceSystemMovieID and ma.ActorID = d.ActorID
)


END
GO
